#: This message contains an uncompressed image
(0, 0) is at top-left corner of image
The legal values for encoding are in file src/image_encodings.cpp
If you want to standardize a new string format, join
ros-users@lists.sourceforge.net and send an email proposing a new encoding.

header.comment: Header timestamp should be acquisition time of image

comment: taken from the list of strings in include/sensor_msgs/image_encodings.h

height.comment: image height, that is, number of rows

width.comment: image width, that is, number of columns

encoding.comment: Encoding of pixels -- channel meaning, ordering, size

data.comment: actual matrix data, size is (step * rows)
